personal.name: Osazee Jedidiah O
personal.title: Blockchain Developer, Program Manager and Data Scientist
personal.bio: I am a data-centric, self-motivated, dedicated, goal-oriented individual with decent moral Values and Ethicates along with a high-energy level, honed communication skills, strong organizational skills, and meticulous attention to detail. I am involved in innovating and building Dapps that solve key problems in society and driving massive adoption of blockchain technology. I am currently interested in building to scaling ethereum(L2 solutions) and Deploy Products that integrates A.I and Blockchain technology.
personal.subtitle: I love exploring new things!
personal.description: I'm a Blockchain developer, Program Manager and Data scientist. Primarily interested in Blockchain Development and Leading teams to deploying quality products on time and in budget. I enjoy learning new skills and implementing them in real life!

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Built and maintained real-time trading automation features with Node.js, React, PostgreSQL, and AWS, supporting 10k+ transactions daily
Deployed event-driven architectures that reduced trade execution latency by 30%, enabling instant swaps and live notifications
Integrated secure wallet services, processing crypto transfers valued at $5M+ monthly with high reliability
Enhanced analytics dashboards and data models, improving trader decision-making by providing real-time portfolio insights

experience.title: Technical Programs Lead
responsibilities: Architected and deployed offline-first logistics and training platforms using Node.js, PostgreSQL, and AWS, achieving 99.5% system uptime across unstable internet environments
Designed and executed scalable codebases used by over 200 interns at Veritas University and additional partner institutions
Automated event-driven workflows, reducing manual reporting time by 40%
Led cross-border engineering teams in Nigeria and the US, improving collaboration velocity by 20% through structured code reviews and agile practices

experience.title: Lead Blockchain & Software Architect
responsibilities: Led design and development of enterprise-grade blockchain and full stack systems for fintech, logistics, and governance clients
Architected event-driven Node.js + PostgreSQL platforms that scaled to 50k+ monthly users across distributed environments
Deployed blockchain-based identity and payments infrastructure, enabling secure cross-border transactions with 99% reliability
Designed data models and reporting flows that improved supply chain visibility and reduced reconciliation time by 25% for client operations
Guided a distributed engineering team, increasing delivery efficiency through code quality enforcement and agile practices
Delivered offline-first, serverless solutions that supported logistics operations in areas with intermittent internet connectivity

experience.title: Blockchain Developer
responsibilities: Built and deployed smart contracts (EIP-2535 upgradeable architecture) supporting decentralized apps with <5% gas cost savings through optimization
Integrated advanced cryptography (Merkle trees, zkProofs) to enhance transaction security and scalability

experience.title: Senior Program Manager / Program Manager
responsibilities: Oversaw enterprise tech programs with budgets exceeding $100k, delivering solutions that scaled to hundreds of learners and clients
Designed and implemented data-driven systems that increased AI program enrollments by 12% month-over-month
Applied analytics to improve operational reporting efficiency, cutting reporting lag by 30%
Facilitated cross-cultural collaboration across Nigeria and the US, enabling smoother distributed delivery

experience.title: Data Alchemist - Quest Designer
responsibilities: Designed and managed quests for the Covalent Data Alchemist program
Provided technical support and organized workshops for Data Alchemists
Organized a Hackathon-in-a-box for the Covalent community in Lagos

experience.title: Tech Support / Data Analyst
responsibilities: Improved geospatial data accuracy by 15% through optimized data pipelines for Edo State Government project

experience.title: Researcher

featured_projects.title: StormBot
featured_projects.description: Telegram-based multi-network trading bot delivering powerful analytics and intelligent trading tools. Features include snipe trading, instant swaps, real-time notifications, and secure wallet management with 10k+ daily transactions.

featured_projects.title: Mansu Mobile Wallet
featured_projects.description: Mobile wallet app for Nigeria & Ghana users to buy, sell, swap, and send cryptocurrency using local fiat currencies. Supports Bitcoin, Ethereum, Tether, and TRON.

featured_projects.title: Mansu Official Website
featured_projects.description: Official website for Mansu cryptocurrency platform, providing information and access to their financial services and mobile wallet application.

featured_projects.title: TCN Insight Live
featured_projects.description: Real-time Q&A and response application for live customer support and engagement, enabling seamless communication and instant feedback.

featured_projects.title: Afrione Project
featured_projects.description: Blockchain-powered e-voucher system enabling cross-border payments and financial inclusion across Africa, the US, and the UK. Commissioned by Blockwave to design and deliver the full architecture and software stack.

featured_projects.title: Prospero Credit Platform
featured_projects.description: Next-generation AI-powered credit platform that uses AI to match borrowers and lenders in real-time, performs AI-driven credit scoring using financial and behavioral data, and records all loans on a private blockchain.

featured_projects.title: Auto360 Supplychain Protocol
featured_projects.description: Built a supply chain protocol on the Ethereum blockchain for tracking goods, providence and performing transactions using the Auto360 Token.

featured_projects.title: DexSense
featured_projects.description: React-based Web Application utilizing the Covalent API to display DEX metrics across multiple chains supported by Covalent for comprehensive DeFi analytics.
